text: ZU TV is a Romanian music television channel, owned by Intact Media Group, the largest Romanian media group. ZU TV was launched on July 1, 2013 online as ZU Channel broadcasting non-stop music. From April 3, 2014, the channel launched on TV under its current name, replacing GSP TV. In November 2022, ZU TV changed its format, from a general channel to a music channel. ==Shows== *ZU News *Eat, Sleep, ZU Repeat *ZU Most Wanted *ZU Party Romanian Tour *BIG IN *K-Pop *Celebrity Playlist *ZUnrise *Face 2 Face ==Other websites== * Category:Television channels in Romania
title: ZU TV
